channel.title: Docs on Wojtyla Night
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Wojtyla Night

item.title: What is Wojtyla Night?
item.description: What is Wojtyla Night? # Wojtyla Night is an event inspired by the life of Pope St. John Paul II (born Karol Wojtyla). It is an evening when we gather together as a community to share those things which evoke the transcendentals of truth, goodness, and beauty, all things which may be called “catholic” (in the small-c sense). After sharing a meal, we participate in something which is part open-mic night, part poetry slam, part art show.
